definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: adjutant or officer (best explained as third man (in chariot), v. esp. Hpt:BAS iv. 586 f. Bender:ZAW xxiii (1903), 19 WMM:As. U. Eur. 329; v. also Kau:M.N.,DPV.1904, 19; doubted by Di:Ex 14, 7 Baen:ib. Buhl:14);—abs. ´[[שׁ]]: of king’s personal attendant at court 2Ki 7:2, 2Ki 7:17, 2Ki 7:19, sf., military officer of king, [[שָֽׁלִשׁׂח]] 2Ki 9:25, [[שָֽׁלִישׁוֹ]] 2Ki 15:25 (on abnormal [[ָ֠]] v. Ges:§ 93 xx Kö:ii. 1. 133, 449, 495); pl. [[שָֽׁלִישִׁים]] Ez Eze 23:15 + (sts. [[שָֽׁלִשִׁם]] etc.) v:Eze 23:23, Ex 14:7, 2Ki 10:25, 2Ki 10:25, + (Qr) 2Sa 23:8 (> Kt [[שׁלשׁי]]), 1Ch 11:11, 1Ch 12:19 (v:1Ch 12:18 van d. H.; Kt in both, [[שׁלושׁים]]), read in all three [[הַשִּׁלשָׁה]] ([[ראׁשׁ]]) chief of the three  LXXL We Dr Bu Now.—[[שָֽׁלִשִׁים]] Pr 22:20 Qr v. [[שִׁלְשׁׂם]].
